<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

A simple Wrapper DiagnosticInfo that generates Module-level diagnostic for TranslateMetadata pass.

Definition at line 41 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/directx/dxiltranslatemetadata-cpp">DXILTranslateMetadata.cpp</a>.

## Public Constructors

### DiagnosticInfoTranslateMD() {#ae7955808c28e0adbac3500b4638239f3}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;DXILTranslateMetadata.cpp&#125;::DiagnosticInfoTranslateMD::DiagnosticInfoTranslateMD (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp; M, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a> &amp; Msg, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abfcab32516704f11d146c757f402ad5c">DiagnosticSeverity</a> Severity=DS&#95;Error)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
<code>M</code> is the module for which the diagnostic is being emitted.

<code>Msg</code> is the message to show. Note that this class does not copy this message, so this reference must be valid for the whole life time of the diagnostic.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/directx/dxiltranslatemetadata-cpp/#l00050">50</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/directx/dxiltranslatemetadata-cpp">DXILTranslateMetadata.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Member Functions

### print() {#af89d7d6a0c2a42447908563c24d9562c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;DXILTranslateMetadata.cpp&#125;::DiagnosticInfoTranslateMD::print (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/diagnosticprinter">DiagnosticPrinter</a> &amp; DP) const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Print using the given <code>DP</code> a user-friendly message.

This is the default message that will be printed to the user. It is used when the frontend does not directly take advantage of the information contained in fields of the subclasses. The printed message must not end with &#39;.&#39; nor start with a severity keyword.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/directx/dxiltranslatemetadata-cpp/#l00054">54</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/directx/dxiltranslatemetadata-cpp">DXILTranslateMetadata.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
